message.content:
cs.IT, cs.MM, cs.SI, cs.DS, cs.LG. 

The paper deals with the problem of multiple description coding, which is a subfield of information theory (cs.IT). The specific problem being addressed is the quadratic Gaussian multiple description coding, which falls under the category of multimedia (cs.MM) and signal processing (cs.SI). The paper also introduces a new encoding scheme based on combinatorial message sharing, which involves combinatorial optimization techniques (cs.DS). Finally, the paper discusses achievable rate-distortion regions, which is a topic in machine learning and statistics (cs.LG).
